text: A member, solely by reason of being a member, shall not act for or bind the limited cooperative association.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

Uniform Law:

This section is based on ยง 503 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act . See Vol. 6A , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE ยง 29-1005.03

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: No power as member to bind association.
